text: "The Things We Do for Love" is a 1976 song by British band 10cc. It is the leading single from their fifth studio album Deceptive Bends. It went to number 5 in both the United States and Australia, number 27 in New Zealand, number 1 in Canada, number 2 in Ireland, number 6 in the United Kingdom and number 13 in the Netherlands. It went on to be covered by Amy Grant and Tina Arena. ==Track listing== ;UK 7" single :A. "The Things We Do for Love" – 3:32 :B. "Hot to Trot" – 4:28 ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:10cc songs Category:Amy Grant songs Category:Tina Arena songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Progressive pop songs
title: The Things We Do for Love (song)
